products.title: Dark Purple &Amp;amp; White (4561 &Amp;amp; 1016)
products.description: The velux duo blackout blind is a blackout blind and a pleated blind in one. It offers the best of both worlds, blackout at anytime and softly diffused natural light all day. It is available in all blackout blind colours in combination with a white pleated blind. Blackout at anytime. Oeko-tex certified. Softly diffuses incoming daylight. Stepless positioning. Slim design integrates perfectly with your roof window.

products.title: Marseille Plum
products.description: Min width: 350mm max width: 1350mm (with join 2500mm) min drop: 400mm max drop: 2500mm fabric composition: 54% viscose / 46% polyester guarantee: 12 months controls: sidewinder control. Fabric lining: fully lined as standard, blackout and interlining available. Fixings: fixing brackets included. Headrail: robust aluminium headrail, 40mm wide x 40mm deep. Finish: fabric attached to headrail with velcro.

products.title: Splash Sloe Purple Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Splash sloe is an extremely attractive dusty purple colour, stylish and timeless. Perfect for injecting colour into any room. Electric roller blinds are perfect for more hard to reach windows and as they are completely cord free they are inherently child safe. This will also add a very modern feel when window dressing, particularly when paired with their smart hub (sold seperately). Splash sloe fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens and bathrooms.

products.title: Splash Indigo Blue Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful & contemporary. This dark blue, almost navy, electric roller blind is a very stylish, on trend colour choice. Their electric roller blinds removes the need for a control chain, making it inherently child safe. Their splash indigo blue roller fabric is also moisture resistant which means it is the best choice for bathrooms and kitchens. At swift direct blinds, their modern, electric roller blinds are put together by the industry experts with decades of experience behind them, as such we are so confident with their high quality products, that this roller blind is covered with their free 5 year guarantee, provided for extra peace of mind when investing in their blinds.

products.title: Vitra Blackout Deep Plum Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their vitra blackout deep plum fabric is a chic very dark blue/ purple shade, it's sleek and stylish and will work beautifully within the home or office. Pair with different purple shades or cool grey tones to create a striking look within your home. Blackout fabrics will completely block light from coming through making them a perfect addition for bedrooms and any room that requires maximum light control.

products.title: Splash Smokey Purple Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling splash range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish which has wonderful light filtering properties. Perfect for offering privacy without completely blocking out all the light. Their splash range is also moisture resistant making it a perfect addition within for kitchens, bathrooms and en-suites. This splash smokey purple electric roller blind will brighten any room.

products.title: Splash Orchid Purple Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their moisture-resistant splash orchid purple electric roller blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The pink/purple hue is a beautiful, bold shade which draws the eye and livens up the decor. Electric blinds are also perfect for hard to reach windows and add a really modern feel to any space. At swift direct blinds, when purchasing this blind you will also be able to take advantage of their free 5 year guarantee, which mean you know you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Bella Blackout Sloe Purple Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and inside your home. This soft sloe purple electric roller blind is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure electric roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.
